attributes.action: Make e-petitions the forefront of ideas on a blog
attributes.additional_details:
The governement to sponsor a pro-active on-line debate on a specific problem(s), or submitted e-petition, to enable a Brain-storming positive result for the benefit of all.
This could be enabled by an invitation email/letter to the persons interested,or via a dedicated web site. Could be made more attractive by giving a monetary reward for the best ideas to the group or individual(s) concerned.
The problem that is possibly particularly difficult to solve and be organised into type of problem e.g. how to improve dog laws, and a precis of the best answers to date.Comments and improvements could be annotated to the "best" answer to date. A win win situation.
